summary: Game app about Jujutsu Kaisen characters fighting in the Culling Games
architectural_notes: Game based on Jujutsu Kaisen anime/manga IP
Combat mechanics focused on character fighting
Culling Games arc as the setting/context
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Dark atmospheric arena background with ominous sky and urban ruins representing Culling Games battleground (arena-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Character portrait for Yuji Itadori in combat stance with determined expression (yuji-portrait.dim_300x400.png)
- Character portrait for Megumi Fushiguro summoning shikigami with focused expression (megumi-portrait.dim_300x400.png)
- Character portrait for Nobara Kugisaki holding hammer and nails with confident smirk (nobara-portrait.dim_300x400.png)
- Character portrait for Maki Zenin wielding cursed weapon with fierce look (maki-portrait.dim_300x400.png)
- Cursed energy icon with swirling purple energy effect (cursed-energy-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Game logo with stylized Japanese calligraphy and dark combat theme (game-logo.dim_400x150.png)

existing_features.title: Create a game arena where Jujutsu Kaisen characters can engage in turn-based combat during the Culling Games
Create a combat system where players can select actions (attack, defend, use cursed technique, or special move) during their turn
Design a character selection screen where players can choose their fighter before entering the arena
Create a battle UI that displays character health bars, cursed energy meters, available abilities, and turn indicators
Apply a distinctive dark fantasy anime-inspired visual theme with bold contrasts, dramatic lighting, and a gritty combat aesthetic that evokes the Jujutsu Kaisen universe and Culling Games atmosphere

new_feature_requests.summary: Jujutsu Kaisen themed game with character combat in Culling Games setting
Implement a roster of playable Jujutsu Kaisen characters with unique abilities and stats (include at least Yuji Itadori, Megumi Fushiguro, Nobara Kugisaki, and Maki Zenin)
Implement a points system reflecting the Culling Games rules where defeating opponents earns points
